content: श्रित {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} [श्रि-क्त] {@--1@} Gone to, approached, approached for refuge or protection. {@--2@} Clung to, resting or sitting on. {@--3@} United or joined with, connected with. {@--4@} Protected. {@--5@} Honoured, served. {@--6@} Subservient, auxiliary. {@--7@} Covered with, overspread. {@--8@} Contained. {@--9@} Assembled, collected. {@--10@} Having, possessing.
